jobs.title: Growth Hacker
jobs.description:
We​ are a young, energetic performance marketing and brand development company based in Shoreditch, London. We ​differentiate​ ​ourselves from​ ​the​ ​competition​ ​with​ ​our​ ​ability​ ​to​ ​create​ ​disruptive​ ​marketing​ ​content​, ​that​ ​drives​ ​scalable​ ​ROI for​ ​our​ ​exclusive​ ​brands.​ ​This​ ​capability​ ​stems​ ​from​ ​the​ ​brilliantly​ ​creative​ ​and​ ​cutting​ ​edge​ ​team here​ ​at​ ​Altitude​ ​Ads.

The Role

We are looking for a creative and tenacious individual with a growth hacking mentality and an entrepreneurial eye to join our team and deliver results. We want someone who has the ability to think outside the box and devise unprecedented strategies to win new markets. You will plan, implement and manage campaigns to drive customer acquisition and retention, focusing on supercharging the growth of our brands, through various platforms and marketing channels.

Duties:

Experiment and implement new growth strategies to boost customer acquisition and retention.
Identify, implement and measure new growth tactics and marketing methods
Develop original and innovative content and strategies to improve SEO and increase brand awareness
Create viral growth through referral marketing and other growth hacking techniques
Establish methods and processes to ensure measurements and experimentation can be done in a scalable and repeatable model
Define strategies for market-driven growth 
Consistently analyse and refine new and existing campaigns to drive revenue, uncover insight and consumer trends
Create and run PPC and social media campaigns
Test methods strategically, producing a set hypothesis, metrics to test and report quantitively 
Manage lead generation campaigns through various digital marketing channels
Drive new customer acquisition through email marketing, influencer marketing, content marketing, video marketing and more 

About you:
Passion and hunger for results
Creative and analytical mindset
Self-motivated
Excellent problem-solving skills
Ability to think innovatively and create new ideas
Enthusiastic high energy, driven and resilient
Intelligent and confident
Proactive attitude
Goal-oriented focus  
Desirable:

You have progressive experience in a strategic marketing role focussed on growth hacking
You have extensive experience developing and launching successful growth marketing campaigns
Proficient in using email creation and distribution platforms, plus managing and tracking effectiveness of campaigns via Google Analytics
Strong digital marketing, social media and HTML capability working in an online-focused organisation
Experience in managing digital marketing at scale across paid and performance channels (inc. PPC, Google, Facebook etc)
Data-driven B2C marketing background with a strong focus on CRM, e-commerce, and retention. 
This is an incredible opportunity for someone looking to make a huge impact within a rapidly growing startup. We have an incredible company culture offering flexible working hours and a fun and energetic team environment. If you have the right experience and skills for this position, then please apply below.

jobs.title: Native Advertising - Media Buyer
jobs.description:
**ABOUT US**

Altitude Ads is a young, fast growing brand creation & development company based in Aldgate, London. We specialise in creating and building digitally native, direct to consumer online brands that scale very quickly. Think of us like a faster, more agile Unilever or Proctor & Gamble that owns digital consumer brands only. Since starting in late 2016, we have achieved over $40m in sales for our brands and are largely considered to be one of the fastest growing companies in the UK & Europe. 

**THE ROLE **

We are looking for a native advertising media buyer to help us create engaging content to market our products online to our customers. This content will be served across various native platforms, including Taboola, Outbrain & Yahoo to achieve specific, target driven objectives (purchase, email capture etc). This position demands a keen, creative eye and an ability to develop persuasive advertising content. 
 
**RESPONSIBILITIES **

- Create and manage new media buying campaigns on native content traffic sources

- Daily analysis of campaign performance

- Optimize ads and landing pages on campaigns based on performance

- Develop and maintain relationships with media buying platform representatives

- Carry out industry research to identify new source opportunities

- Identify the target audience for a particular media campaign and decide how best to communicate to that audience

- Coordinate with design team to create new and exciting marketing material

- Create and maintain online campaigns profitability

**ABOUT YOU:**

- Experience with paid media buying native advertising platforms (Outbrain, Taboola, Yahoo etc)

- Success with previous media buying campaigns (ability to provide examples)

- Strong knowledge of online media channels is a necessity

- Ability to plan and create new marketing approach ideas and concepts (includes content writing)

- Creative content writing capabilities

- Demonstrate history of optimizing historic campaigns to reach KPIs such as return on ad spend (ROAS) and cost per acquisition (CPA)

- Strong organizational skills and able to prioritize workload under pressure

-  Ability to prioritise your workload appropriately

jobs.title: Amazon Account Manager
jobs.description:
Altitude is a rapidly growing brand launching platform that has brand in the wellness, beauty and pet verticals. The group currently focuses solely on digital channels (Predominantly Facebook and Google) with it’s Amazon revenue streams contributing to 20% of overall revenue. Altitude has an entrepreneurial culture and is looking for a self-starter to come in and take control of our accounts and actively grow product sales across various geographies (Canada, UK, Australia, Germany).
 
**Purpose of Post:**
Our Amazon business has grown from 5% of total revenue to over 20% in the last year and we need someone with experience in growing amazon accounts, “rank hacking” and launching new products successfully. You will be working closely with the brand CEOs to create and implement Amazon growth strategies. 
 
 
**Major Duties:**
* Working with current contractors and CEOs to create a series of growth projects. With an analytical background, you will be required to take full P&L responsibility across multiple countries working with various currencies.
* You will need to be familiar with working with cross channel marketing and digital teams to improve our presence online.
 
**Skills Required:**

* Must have 2-4 years Amazon direct experience
* Working with accounts that achieve $1m-5m revenue per year
* Have worked with Amazon PPC and can implement a keyword strategy
* Strong communication and team management skills
* FBA and FOB experience
* AMS activity
* Global buying contact agreement management
* Amazon Europe OPCO’s and USA/Canada/Mexico experience
* A proven track record in growing Amazon business locally in the UK and globally
* Must have experience of full P&L and forecasting responsibility
* Good analytical and category management skill
* Able to work within a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment
* Project management
* Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
 
**Experience:**

* AMS activity: 3 years
* growing Amazon business locally in the UK and globally: 3 years
* local and direct supply route management: 3 years
* Amazon Europe POCO’s and USA/Canada/Mexico: 3 years
* project management: 3 years
* Global buying contact agreement management: 3 years
* full P&L and forecasting responsibility: 3 years
* analytical and category management: 3 years
* FBA and FOB: 3 years (Required)

jobs.title: Facebook Paid Social - Media Buyer
jobs.description:
Altitude Ads is a young and vibrant brand building company based in the heart of London, we are currently on our mission to scale over the next two years and are on the lookout for the best available talent to come on board to sustain our growth. We are a rapidly growing direct-to-consumer, digital marketing company (former start-up, now firmly-established in the 4th year of trading currently at 44 employees and scaling into the 60+. In the US we had a $40 million turnover in 2019 

**Job Description**
* The key driver to our rapid growth is our highly experienced team of performance media buyers.
* Full knowledge and ability to utilize the Facebook Ads Manager.
* As a team we are able to rapidly scale brands to monthly 7 figure revenues, using our expertise in conversion based media buying. 
* Our buyers have unlimited monthly budgets with some managing over $500k in spending per month, whilst always remaining profitable.
* As well as unlimited budgets, our team has no commission caps, the more value you provide, the more direct benefit you see. 
* An ambitious, highly self-motivated media buyer with experience running profitable conversion-based Facebook campaigns. 
* You will be working as part of a collaborative team of performance media buyers
* With full authority over every aspect of your campaigns, it is your duty to provide great results. 
* This requires a combination of creative, innovative thinking to create engaging ads PLUS the analytical skills to scale & manage profitability to the dollar.

**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES**
* Full autonomy over every aspect of campaigns
* Tailoring creatives for our products to resonate with a target audience 
* Creating & refining video ads, image ads, landing pages
* The building, managing & scaling Facebook campaigns 
* Minimum 2 years experience running Facebook Ads
* Experience running conversion objective campaigns with a specific CPA target
* Creativity in everything you do, innovative ideas that will take your campaigns to the next level.
* Autonomy across your work and with your team.
* Attention to detail

**PREFERABLE SKILLS **
* Experience creating video ads
* In-depth knowledge of the direct to consumer business model 
* Experience building & optimizing landing pages 
* Experience in running native campaigns

jobs.title: Social Media Executive
jobs.description:
Cel is an award-winning DTC Unisex haircare brand that is looking for an enthusiastic and bright individual to help it become one of the worlds leading premium hair care companies. Based out of London, Cel is part of the Altitude Ads group that specializes in creating consumer brands that deliver incredible products and customer experiences. You will be joining a small and focussed marketing, content, and branding team that is currently on a mission to create and launch some of the worlds leading hair care products.

Cel currently has 3 Instagram accounts (with over 50k followers), 650 micro-influencers, a Facebook community page, and a YouTube channel. We need someone to help us create and syndicate incredible content across these channels and make sure our influencers and customers love every experience with us. We want someone who is passionate about cosmetics and believe that our customers have the ability to reinvent themselves through our different product ranges. 

Requirements 

* Great understanding of and enthusiasm for the latest trends in social content & developments on social platforms
* Someone experienced in using editing software and applications, and social media management tools eg. Later, Hootsuite, VSCO.
* Someone with a strong creative streak and a keen eye for digital design
* Experienced in creating and executing successful social media campaigns, from initial content creation to reporting and analytics
* Enthusiasm for up our “special gifting program” where we reward customers with random acts of kindness and bringing some exciting ideas to the table
* Someone who has experience or a wider interest in additional areas of digital marketing, alongside social media (e.g. owned, earned, paid and shared media)
* A positive sociable character who can help coordinate our 650 influencers in US, UK and AUS. 
* A candidate who is experienced in and enjoys writing for a B2C audience
* Someone confident and able to adapt easily when facing obstacles and challenges such as new product launches on short timescales
* Someone positive, who is confident at overcoming obstacles and embraces challenges
* Experienced in managing own time and targets

Experience required
* Social media management - 2 Years
* Content management - 2 Years
* Content creation - 1 Year
* Copywriting (Instagram comments, email campaigns, etc.) - 2 years
* Stakeholder management (Keeping our influencers network excited!) - 1 Year
* Marketing strategy & execution - 2 Years
* Cosmetics industry - 2 Years

jobs.title: CFO - eCommerce
jobs.description:
We are an award-winning direct-to-consumer company that is rapidly growing (currently at 44 employees and scaling into the 60+ region over the next few months). Last year, our brands had a combined turnover of over $40 Million dollars and we are now looking for an experienced qualified accountant to join as CFO.

The company is a young, vibrant and rapidly growing brand building incubator based in the heart of London. Due to significant traction and venture capital interest, over the next two years, we will be hyperscaling our brands and are looking for the best talent to come on board and join us in this exciting growth phase.
 

* The role will focus on managing all areas within the finance function including compliance, financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting, strategy, audit, legal and financial reporting. 
* One of the CFO’s primary functions is around financial disciplines and resource allocation for the company.
* Ensuring Financial metrics are available time for decision making.
* The candidate will need to be able to balance being hands-on and in the detail with junior accountants whilst working on strategy and analysis to drive business performance with senior executives.
* The company has outgrown its small business systems and current accounting system (Xero) and requires a complete overhaul. The main objective for 2020 for this role is the creation of a fully-functioning reporting system, which will require coordination with in-house and external developers
* Special experience in company restructuring and its implications will also be valued highly.
* Exposure to US GAAP will be an advantage as the majority of the company’s business comes from US states, even though the Head Office is in London.
* Minimum 4 years experience in a COO/CFO position, ideally in the online advertising or digital marketing industry.
* Control over international financial and accounting policies, standards, and guidelines for the company and subsidiaries to ensure standardization of finance and related work on a global level to report to international standards and to assist in the consolidation of accounts into Investor companies.
* Liaising with our bookkeepers, accountant and outside help to ensure all transaction data is up to date and accounted for.
* Ensure that all financial endeavors are organized, systematic and comply with government regulations and legislation.
* Eager to get involved in AdHoc tasks and innovation within the finance teams' endeavors.

jobs.title: Direct Response Copywriter
jobs.description:
We are looking for an extremely creative and talented direct response copywriter to join our dynamic team of superstars based in Tower Hill,  London. You will need to be an expert in writing high converting ad copy for Landing Pages, Sales Funnels, Sales Letters, Emails and VSL. Our ideal candidate will be a skilful and accomplished copywriter consistently pushing to deliver exceptional results and exceed expectations! If you feel you fit this description then we would love to hear from you! We are a young, energetic brand development company constantly on the lookout for talented superstars to help supercharge our growth further and take us to the next level.

**Responsibilities include:**
* Write high converting sales copy for landing pages and sales funnels
* Build high converting storyboards for our facebook ads. 
* Working with head of content to create high converting email campaigns 
* Collaborate with media buyers to devise marketing strategies. 
* Bring the Petlab Co brand to life in creative and engaging copy
* Understand NLP psychological suggestions to dive deeper into your customer's emotions to push harder for the sale
* Produce high converting copy that will drive the CPA down.
* Manage smaller copy briefs with feedback and sign off to more junior members of the team 
* Work with team members to encourage closer collaboration and consistency with work that is produced outside of the office and by the transcreation team.

**Requirements **
* Minimum 5+ years experience working as a copywriter with a proven track record of writing copy that produces conversions.
* Interpret creative direction and convert briefs into persuasive copy concepts.
* Simultaneously manage multiple projects with short deadlines.
* Produce copy concepts and present underlying strategic thinking
* Strong grammar and punctuation skills 
* A love for brand storytelling and capturing a reader's interest through copy. 
* A creative thinker who can translate strategic marketing needs into clever, on-brand copy that will engage the reader's interest and add to the conversion rate
* Comfortable with long-form and short-form copy briefs.
* Ability to work under pressure and to strict deadlines whilst collaborating with other teams.  
* A varied background in advertising, eCommerce, and digital marketing. 
* Excellent communication skills to present ideas and concepts back to team members.

jobs.title: HR Manager
jobs.description:
This is an exciting opportunity to join a young, energetic & vibrant brand development company based in the Aldgate area of London. We are looking for an enthusiastic and passionate HR professional to define, structure and strengthen our HR & Payroll functions whilst maintaining the company culture we love and pride ourselves on! 

**Duties and responsibilities(will include but not be limited to)**
* Acting as the first point of contact for all HR & payroll queries including tax queries, holiday calculations, absence reporting, policies, administration
* Lead all strategic HR projects focused on implementing processes and procedures
* Assisting the transition to a new integrated HR & Payroll software
* Generating correspondence relating to employee lifecycle; contract changes, probation extensions, sickness absence, maternity/paternity/shared parental leave, disciplinary and grievance matters & performance management
* Updating and maintaining accurate HR & payroll records including individual Personnel files.
* Advising on employee safety, welfare, wellness, and health
* Responsible for the leaver & starter process for staff, undertaking exit interviews where appropriate and providing feedback to line managers where necessary.
* Be a subject matter expert and keep up to date with current and new legislation/tax/benefits
